title: How to write an absence letter due to family issues - Quora

response.answer_text: Whether it is for university or an employer, check the rules first. For university you may write something like: due to unforeseen circumstances with my family, I must return to help with the farm, care of a sick relative, the younger siblings, etc. Please list my classes as incomplete, and put a hold on my scholarship monies. I estimate my return in ____________ weeks/months.an employer you would have to have a meeting and usually tender your resignation. Unless you know it will be a short period.

Just tell the truth in a convincing way. Recognize that many employers will ignore you. Work has to get done, no matter what our valid reasons are. We are paid for a to do a task by our employers. It is unlikely, but who would drive the school bus, who would cook the meals, etc if somehow we all had valid reasons for not going to work?
